name: Poisend Floor
description:
In this game, you play as a Factory worker who needs to jump over toxic liquid to get to his family

This game was made for the weekly Gamejam of the week 107

with the Theme "Don´t touch it"

It's my first game ever released

And I know that some things are not perfect

but the most important thing is that i enjoyed putting the game together

and i learned a lot
